venue.name: Odiorne Point State Park Phone: Odiorne:

item.description:
Meet 11:00 a.m. from the parking area near the bridge on Rte 1A at Ordione Point State Park if you'd like to circumnavigate NewCastle Island. This is a level 3 paddle for those who have sea kayaks and experience on the ocean. For those who want to play in the rock gardens or waves please bring a helmet

Meet at noon same location as above for those who would like to spend time paddling the inner harbor of Little Harbor or the islands near Sagamore River. This is a level 2 paddle for anyone who has a rec or sea kayak.

PFD aka life jackets are required to paddle with this group. Additional safety gear such as pump & paddle float is recommended.

The 2 groups will then regroup at the Odiorne Beach near the Jetty for some swimming or practice some kayak skills session. Bring a picnic lunch and your swim suit and have fun in the warm water.

Check back by Sunday morning as information for this event may change
item.name: Newcastle Circumnav Ocean Paddle or Little Harbor to Sagamore River
